data.name: connector_displayName
data.value: Windows Active Directory Connector

data.name: display_CreateHomeDirectory
data.value: Create Home Directory

data.name: display_DirectoryAdminName
data.value: Directory Adminstrator's Account

data.name: display_DirectoryAdminPassword
data.value: Directory Administrator's Password

data.name: display_domainName
data.value: Domain Name

data.name: display_LDAPHostName
data.value: Active Directory Domain Controller Hostname

data.name: display_ObjectClass
data.value: Object class for User Objects

data.name: display_SearchChildDomains
data.value: Search Child Domains

data.name: display_SearchContainer
data.value: Search Container

data.name: display_SyncDomainController
data.value: ActiveSync Domain Controller

data.name: display_SyncGlobalCatalogServer
data.value: ActiveSync Global Catalog Server

data.name: display_SyncSearchContext
data.value: ActiveSync Search Context

data.name: help_CreateHomeDirectory
data.value: Specify whether or not the home directory for the user will be created.

data.name: help_DirectoryAdminName
data.value: Enter the administrator user name with which the system should authenticate. The setting should be in the form 'domainname'\'username'.

data.name: help_DirectoryAdminPassword
data.value: Enter the password that should be used when authenticating.

data.name: help_domainName
data.value: Name of the windows domain (e.g. windowsdomain.mycompany.com)

data.name: help_LDAPHostName
data.value: For cross-domain administration, enter the hostname, IP address, or domain name of the LDAP server.

data.name: help_ObjectClass
data.value: Specify the class of object that will be managed on this resource.

data.name: help_SearchChildDomains
data.value: Select if you want searches of Active Directory to include child domains. In addition, the Search Container and Sync Search Context attributes must be set to the top of the parent domain, e.g. DC=mydomain,DC=com.

data.name: help_SearchContainer
data.value:
Specify the container object from which users should be retrieved when loading from the resource.
For example, if you want to retrieve users from the Users container, enter CN=Users, DC=MYDOMAIN, DC=COM.

data.name: help_SyncDomainController
data.value: Domain controller to use during active sync. Only used if not searching child domains.

data.name: help_SyncGlobalCatalogServer
data.value: Name of the global catalog server. This is needed only if searching child domains

data.name: help_SyncSearchContext
data.value: Distinguished name of the object under which to search for changes during ActiveSync

data.name: ex_ConnectorNotConfigured
data.value: Connector has not been configured

data.name: ex_DeleteNotSupported
data.value: Delete is not supported for ObjectClass {0}

data.name: ex_InvalidObjectClass
data.value: Invalid object class: {0}

data.name: ex_missingSyncAttribute
data.value: Attribute {0} is not present in connector object. Cannot proceed with synchronization

data.name: ex_OperationalAttributeNull
data.value: The name operational attribute cannot be null

data.name: ex_SyncNotAvailable
data.value: Sync operation is not available for ObjectClass {0}

data.name: ex_UIDNotPresent
data.value: Uid was not present

data.name: ex_InvalidObjectClassInConfiguration
data.value: Invalid Object Class was specified in the connector configuration. Object Class \'{0}\' was not found in Active Directory

data.name: ex_AttributeNull
data.value: Could not add connector attribute to <null> search result

data.name: ex_CouldNotAddNullAttributeToDe
data.value: Could not add connector attribute to <null> directory entry

data.name: ex_ExpectingSingleValue
data.value: Expecting single value, but found multiple values for attribute {0}

data.name: ex_ObjectClassInvalidForConnector
data.value: ObjectClass \'{0}\' is not valid for this connector

data.name: ex_InvalidCredentials
data.value: Invalid credentials supplied for user {0}

data.name: ex_PasswordMustBeReset
data.value: Password expiration can only be reset by reseting the password

data.name: ex_LockAccountNotAllowed
data.value: Active Directory does not support locking users. User may be unlocked only

data.name: ex_invalidSearchScope
data.value: An invalid searchscope was supplied: {0}
